events.message: I ordered a jacket last week, but it doesn't fit and I'd like to request a refund for the purchase. Please advise on how to proceed with the return.
The case has been categorized under Refund as the customer requests a return and money back due to size issues with the jacket.
Assigning this refund request to agent Sarah J. for handling and follow-up with the customer.
Hello, I’m Sarah from customer support. I understand you want to return your jacket and get a refund. I’m here to help you with this process.
Could you please confirm your order number and whether the jacket has been worn or damaged in any way since delivery?
Thanks for the quick reply. My order number is 123456789, and the jacket is brand new, I haven’t worn it outside or damaged it.
Thank you for confirming. I have initiated your refund request and emailed you the prepaid return label. Once we receive the jacket back, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
I appreciate the quick assistance and the clear information. I’ll send the jacket back today using the label you provided.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund successfully. The amount should reflect on your payment method shortly.
Just checking in to ensure you have received your refund and if there’s anything else we can assist you with today.
The case is now closed as the refund was issued and the customer confirmed satisfaction with the resolution.
